Articles.Content:
Talk about 9/11 here...

I googled some 9/11 video's today and found one of people jumping out of the towers...

I was nearly in tears by the end of it, but I didn't cry because my 8 year-old brother was in my room with me and think I am a baby.
There's some pictures out there that really opened my eyes on how awful it was. They're pretty graphic so I won't post them but, it was awful.

Um, no, just no. There are plenty of places you can go to discuss this. We're not having any of it here because it will degenerate into a flame fest.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
